title: 关于神奇宝贝
author: 蜃あ
txt_content: 为什么up主开局选精灵宝可梦都是闪光的？

replies.author: 夏衣
replies.txt_content:
Settings that control the starter screen and Pokémon.
Starters {
    # Level (min=5, max=100).
    level=5
    # Shiny starters.
    shiny=false//是否为异色

replies.author: 梦之境
replies.txt_content: 因为他们用的都是自己魔改过的

replies.txt_content:
